price: 55. Ehlu-Jannuhu, waxay maalintaas ku sugnaan shuqul (la raaxeysi xaasaskooda) iyagoo faraxsan.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
